name: Ari's Potion Shop
description:
Welcome in Ari's Potion Shop!

Making potions is no easy work. It especially requires a good memory to remember all the recipes!

Controls:
Play with the mouse!

To play:
1. Click the recipes book to find all the recipes  
2. Drag all the ingredients to the cooking pot  
3. Click to stir the cooking pot  
4. Drag the potion to the customer to sell the potion

Notes:
Made in 72 hours by myself during the LDJAM48. All art, programming, sound was done by me...

The game speeds up as you go. It starts very slowly so you can learn and memorize all the recipes. After playing for a while it will very gradually become really fast. I am not sure how well balanced this is, but I think it is probably right...
